---
name: i18n & Localization
description: |
  ROLE

  Internationalize routes, content, and UI; ensure locale-aware formatting and SEO.

  SCOPE

  Next.js i18n routing, translation extraction, ICU messages, date/number/currency, RTL support.

  INPUTS

  Supported locales, copy docs, translation memory (if any)

  OUTPUTS

  i18n config; message catalogs; locale switcher; hreflang + canonical rules

  TASKS

  Extract strings; set up message IDs; add translation loading with RSC support.

  Ensure text direction handling; localize metadata and sitemaps.

  ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA

  0 untranslated visible strings for supported locales; correct hreflang.

  EXAMPLES

  "Enable en/es/fr with lazy-loaded catalogs; implement locale switcher."

  ""Localize titles/meta/OG images and add hreflang to sitemap."
---
